text: He restored the border of Israel to where it had been, from Lebo-hamath as far as the Sea of the Arabah,14:25. “Sea of the Arabah”: the Arabah is the Jordan Valley, so this would refer to the Dead Sea. as the Lord, the God of Israel, had said through his servant Jonah, son of Amittai, the prophet, who came from Gath-hepher.
